name: Kttyworld Games
description: KTTY World is a story rich, onchain gaming universe blending strategic idle gameplay with collectible NFT companions. Players explore lore driven missions, earn rewards, and evolve their Tamers and KTTYs in a living ecosystem. Built for longevity, our platform integrates sustainable tokenomics, community governance, and AI enhanced mechanics.

contracts.label: KTTY Staking
contracts.description: Stake KTTYs to earn rewards and enhance your gameplay experience.

contracts.label: KTTY World Tamers
contracts.description: Take your first steps as a KTTY Tamer into the magical 3D world of Felysia!
